thread.title: His Goal: Finish the Boston Marathon by Hand

author: Jen Murphy
title: His Goal: Finish the Boston Marathon by Hand
text:
Most runners will complain about aching quads after tackling the legendary hills of the Boston Marathon on April 16. Paul Kelly is anticipating burning biceps. He’s one of 60 handcyclists competing in the 2018 race. He estimates that he’ll make over 12,000 revolutions on his handcycle to complete the 26.2-miles.
Mr. Kelly, 62, is a quadriplegic due to a spinal-cord injury he suffered 40 years ago. He experiences paralysis in all four limbs, but can still use a few arm, shoulder and back muscles to operate a handcycle, essentially...
